 We would like to invite you to the International Multidisciplinary Conference on English as a Catalyst for Knowledge Transfer and Collaboration in European University Alliances. The conference explores the role of English as a tool for knowledge transfer and collaboration in European university alliances. It also examines strategies for fostering multilingualism and inclusivity in English-medium education. 

 Description 

About the conference 

We are pleased to invite you to a multidisciplinary conference focusing on two current topics: 

The Role of English in Building the European University 
 How does English function as a shared tool for knowledge transfer and collaboration across science, education, and administration within European University alliances This theme explores how English facilitates cooperation in multilingual settings, with a focus on terms, phenomena, and practices unique to the English language, as well as the challenges posed by different practices and their interpretations across universities. 

Fostering Multilingualism and Supporting Multicultural-Based English-Medium Instruction in European University Alliances 
 What strategies support an inclusive and diverse academic environment? This theme highlights best practices, policies, and projects that promote equity and representation in the context of increasing reliance on English in universities where it is not the dominant language.

Target Audience

Conference Format 

The event will feature keynote lectures, talks, panel discussions, fishbowl discussions, poster sessions, and interactive workshops, providing a platform for exchanging ideas and experiences.
